急度: (キッと) - (きっと only)  surely/undoubtedly/almost certainly/most likely (e.g. 90 percent); (esp. キッと) sternly/severely; (きっと only) having no slack/rigid/stiff/tight; (きっと only)  suddenly/abruptly/instantly
急性中毒: (きゅうせいちゅうどく) - acute poisoning; acute intoxication
急性冠症候群: (きゅうせいかんしょうこうぐん) - acute coronary syndrome; ACS
急性心筋梗塞: (きゅうせいしんきんこうそく) - acute myocardial infarction; AMI
急性心筋炎: (きゅうせいしんきんえん) - acute myocarditis
急性感染症: (きゅうせいかんせんしょう) - acute infection
急性放射線症: (きゅうせいほうしゃせんしょう) - {med} acute radiation syndrome; ARS; acute radiation sickness
急性放射線症候群: (きゅうせいほうしゃせんしょうこうぐん) - {med} acute radiation syndrome; ARS; acute radiation sickness
急性放射線障害: (きゅうせいほうしゃせんしょうがい) - {med} acute radiation syndrome; ARS; acute radiation damage

急性脳症: (きゅうせいのうしょう) - acute encephalopathy
急性腎不全: (きゅうせいじんふぜん) - acute renal failure
急性腹症: (きゅうせいふくしょう) - acute abdomen; stomach problem requiring immediate surgery
急成長: (きゅうせいちょう) - rapid growth
急成長企業: (きゅうせいちょうきぎょう) - rapidly growing company
急所: (きゅうじょ) - vital point (critical place to make a move in the game of Go)
急所を突く: (きゅうしょをつく) - to touch the vital point
急拠: (きゅうきょ) - hurriedly; in a hurry
急拡大: (きゅうかくだい) - boom; sudden expansion
急拵え: (きゅうごしらえ) - hastily made; improvised preparation
急接近: (きゅうせっきん) - fast approach; quick intimacy
急旋回: (きゅうせんかい) - sharp turn; tight turn; steep turn
急流: (きゅうりゅう) - swift current; rapids
急流下り: (きゅうりゅうくだり) - river rafting
急浮上: (きゅうふじょう) - bursting through the surface/suddenly surfacing/rapid ascent; sudden increase (e.g. in public interest); fast rise (e.g. in rank)
急火: (きゅうび) - sudden fire; nearby fire
急病人: (きゅうびょうにん) - an emergency patient or case
急発展: (きゅうはってん) - boom (development, sales, etc.)
急立てる: (せきたてる) - to hurry (up); to press; to urge on
急落: (きゅうらく) - sudden fall; sharp fall; sudden drop; sharp drop
急行: (きゅうこう) - moving at high speed; express (e.g. train that bypasses many stations)
急行停車駅: (きゅうこうていしゃえき) - express station
急行列車: (きゅうこうれっしゃ) - express train
急行料金: (きゅうこうりょうきん) - express charge
急襲: (きゅうしゅう) - raid; assault; descent
急角度: (きゅうかくど) - steep angle; acute angle
急設: (きゅうせつ) - hurried construction; speedy laying
急足: (いそぎあし) - fast pace; quick pace
急転回: (きゅうてんかい) - abrupt turn; sudden change
急転悪化: (きゅうてんあっか) - (yoji) suddenly turning for the worse; sudden deterioration
急転直下: (きゅうてんちょっか) - (yoji) suddenly and precipitately; take a sudden turn
急込む: (せきこむ) - to sound agitated, hurried, flustered; to be impatient
急迫した: (きゅうはくした) - urgent; pressing; imminent
急速充電: (きゅうそくじゅうでん) - fast charge
急速凍結: (きゅうそくとうけつ) - quick-freezing; rapid freezing

急進派: (きゅうしんは) - radical faction or group
急降下: (きゅうこうか) - swoop; nose dive
急降下爆撃: (きゅうこうかばくげき) - dive bombing
急難: (きゅうなん) - sudden or unexpected disaster
急須の口: (きゅうすのくち) - spout of a teapot
急風: (きゅうふう) - high fan speed (setting on air conditioner); squall/sudden gust
急騰: (kyuutou) - aumento repentino (no preço), subida acentuada, salto, disparada
性: (sei/shou) - gender , one's nature, one's destiny; custom, tradition, habit, convention
性が合う: (しょうがあう) - to get along well with
性に合う: (しょうにあう) - to be congenial; to agree with one
性の区別: (せいのくべつ) - distinction of the sexes
性の悪い犬: (しょうのわるいいぬ) - vicious dog; ill-tempered dog
性の良い: (しょうのいい) - of good quality
性ホルモン: (せいホルモン) - sex hormone (e.g. estrogen, testosterone)
性俗: (せいぞく) - sexual culture; sexual mores
